originalText.text: After reading many positive reviews, I contacted Victoria with a question about a few pieces of art I had inherited and didn't know much about. She responded very quickly and was incredibly generous with her time and knowledge. She answered all my questions, had looked into my pieces before we had our call, and gave me all the information I needed at no cost. I believe if I had contacted a different appraiser I may have sunk significant money into having my art evaluated and Victoria really saved me that! I mentioned in passing that I was also trying to have some jewelry appraised and she very kindly offered to take a look at those pieces as well. I found her extremely helpful and honest and would encourage anyone towards utilizing her services!

originalText.text: After my apartment flooded and some of my cherished artwork got damaged, I reached out to Victoria and I'm so glad I did! Victoria was so informative, compassionate, kind, and generous in offering her time and her wisdom. She gave me lots of guidance and very sound advice, and also referred me to informed colleagues. She went far above and beyond in every way possible.  Working with her was my pleasure not only because of her skill set and all that she offers but also because she just has really great energy! I highly recommend Victoria for any needs you might have with respect to appraising, selling or getting advice about your artwork.

originalText.text: I was seeking assistance with selling my father's collection of prints from the 70s and connected with Victoria after reading many positive reviews online. Victoria responded right away and gave me advice on photographing the pieces and organizing all of the information we needed to find potential buyers. She was extremely helpful and devoted a lot of time and attention to this project, even though the collection was ultimately of modest value. Victoria was very warm and understanding throughout the process. Through her connections, she helped me get an offer for some of the more valuable pieces. I ultimately ended up going in a different direction, but I would happily work with Victoria again in the future.

originalText.text: I had a great experience working with Victoria. She's super knowledgeable, easy to work with, prompt and efficient. Having provided multiple appraisals for me, she was then able to connect me to an art restorer as well as an expert in insuring paintings.

text.text: I had a great experience working with Victoria. She's super knowledgeable, easy to work with, prompt and efficient. Having provided multiple appraisals for me, she was then able to connect me to an art restorer as well as an expert in insuring paintings.

originalText.text: Victoria was very helpful and timely with her assistance.  While she does not work specifically with jewelry, she presented several options and inevitably brokered a connection with the appropriate auction house that was able to sell my ring for me.  The process to engage her services was easy and she was very responsive to emails and texts if I had any questions.  Having Victoria there to guide me through the process made me feel confident in the outcome.  I would recommend her in a heartbeat.
